thread.title: Ground News - Blackpool Tower fire: Video captures 'blaze' as people evacuated
thread.title_full: Ground News - Blackpool Tower fire: Video captures 'blaze' as people evacuated

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Blackpool Tower fire: Video captures 'blaze' as people evacuated
text:
Summary by Ground News Incident reported at around 2.15pm today and there are six fire engines at the scene. Pictures and videos have been shared widely on social media showing flames coming from the top of the structure. Streets around the tower have been cordoned off by police following the blaze - believed to have occurred close to the 360 degree viewing platform. Share menu More
